{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T17:21:18.000Z", "description": "

Leading Healthcare firm is looking for an Analytics Lead to assist in achieving business growth. This is a great opportunity to have a tremendous impact on client success by utilizing your analytic skills and applying business insights.



 Responsibilities:  


  • Developing predictive models and test plans to support continuous improvement of campaign efforts using SAS/SQL/Python
  • Work closely with internal and external stakeholders to develop KPI frameworks, interactive dashboards to optimize direct marketing programs
  • Performing quantitative analysis to predict customer behavior as well as market mix modeling
  • Develop and deliver client presentations \u2013 including data analysis and written content


Qualifications:


  • 6+ years of experience in a data-driven role
  • Advanced Excel experience; running statistical analysis and predictive models, developing financial models, running sensitivity analyses, automating tasks, etc.
  • SQL, SAS, Python or other programming language experience
  • Expertise with Tableau, Power BI, or other reporting/campaign management software
